products.name: Kirkland Minoxidil for Men

images.name: Front view
images.alt: Front view of Kirkland Minoxidil for Men.

products.description: Kirkland Minoxidil 5% Foam is a fast-absorbing hair regrowth treatment for men dealing with thinning or hereditary hair loss. It reactivates dormant follicles to promote thicker, fuller hair. The foam is gentle, quick-drying, and ideal for everyday use.

details.name: Features
items: Contains 5% Minoxidil for effective hair regrowth.
Dries quickly with no greasy residue.
Mess-free design suitable for daily routines.
Alcohol-free and safe for sensitive skin.
Noticeable improvement within 3–6 months of consistent use.
Offers quality results at a lower cost compared to branded options.

details.name: Shipping
items: Free shipping on orders over Ksh 5000.
International shipping available.
1–2 business days within Nairobi.
2–4 days nationwide.

details.name: Returns
items: Easy return requests.
Eligible for return or exchange within 7 days if unopened.
60 day return window.

details.name: Reviews
items: James K. – “This product really works! My hair started filling in after 2 months of consistent use.”
Brian M. – “Good value for money. I’ve tried Rogaine before but Kirkland gives the same results for less.”
Kelvin O. – “Fast delivery and original product. Customer service was super helpful too!”
Samuel N. – “Noticed reduced shedding after 3 weeks. The foam feels light and non-greasy.”
Peter M. – “Highly recommend! Genuine Kirkland minoxidil and affordable pricing.”

products.name: Kirkland Minoxidil for Women

images.name: Front view
images.alt: Front view of Kirkland Minoxidil for Men.

products.description: Kirkland Minoxidil for Women is a proven hair regrowth treatment formulated to help women experiencing thinning hair or gradual hair loss. Its 5% topical solution revitalizes hair follicles from the root, promoting natural regrowth and fuller, thicker hair. Easy to apply and dermatologist-tested, this treatment helps restore confidence and a healthier-looking hairline over consistent use.

details.name: Features
items: Contains 5% Minoxidil, the only FDA-approved ingredient for women’s hair regrowth.
Reactivates dormant hair follicles to promote new growth
Noticeable improvement in hair thickness and coverage within 2–4 months of regular use.
Absorbs quickly without leaving residue on the scalp
Comes with a precision dropper for targeted use.
From Kirkland Signature — known for quality and effectiveness.

details.name: Shipping
items: Free shipping on orders over Ksh 5000.
International shipping available.
1–2 business days within Nairobi.
2–4 days nationwide.

details.name: Returns
items: Easy return requests.
Eligible for return or exchange within 7 days if unopened.
60 day return window.

products.name: Rogaine for Men

images.name: Front view
images.alt: Front view of rogaine for men.

products.description: topical hair loss treatment with the primary feature of using 5% Minoxidil as its active ingredient. It is specifically formulated to address male pattern baldness and general thinning on the top of the scalp (vertex)

details.name: Features
items: Contains 5% Minoxidil for revitalizing hair follicles.
Stimulates hair regrowth
Visible results possible in as little as 12 weeks with consistent use.
Available in both a quick-drying, unscented foam and a topical solution with a dropper
Uses alpha-hydroxy acid (AHA) to exfoliate the skin,
Treatment requires continuous, twice-daily application to maintain any hair regrowth;

products.name: Pure Essential Rosemary Oil
products.description: potent oil with diverse features, including strong antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and antimicrobial properties. Its pungent, herbaceous aroma is used in aromatherapy to boost mental clarity, memory, and concentration, while also providing stress relief. It is widely used for skin and hair care to improve circulation, moisturize, fight acne, and stimulate hair growth.

items: celebrated for stimulating hair follicles

protect the skin from damage, reduce redness.

help relieve various types of pain

products.name: DHT Blockers Complex
products.description: DHT blocker complex capsules are dietary supplements designed to combat hair loss by using a blend of natural ingredients, vitamins, and minerals that help manage the levels of dihydrotestosterone (DHT) in the body.

details.name: Features
items: Has anti-inflammatory properties that support scalp health
Nourishes hair follicles and regulating hormone levels.
Promotes new, thicker, and fuller hair growth
Support for Hormonal Balance
Reduced Hair Fall and Shedding

products.name: Batana Oil
products.description: Batana oil's key features include its source from the American oil palm nut, a deep golden-brown color, and an earthy scent. It is rich in essential fatty acids, vitamins Vitamin E ,Vitamin A and antioxidants that deeply moisturize hair and skin, repair damage, reduce frizz, and soothe scalp irritation. It is also noted for being a natural, cold-pressed oil free from synthetic additives.

details.name: Features
items: Hydrates hair, repairs split ends, and enhances elasticity and resilience.
Nourishes hair follicles
supports the hair's natural renewal cycle, contributing to thicker, fuller hair
Reduces breakage, tames frizz, and enhances shine.
Conditions hair follicles and helps alleviate dry, irritated scalp conditions.

products.name: Derma Stamp
products.description: Derma stamping benefits include stimulating collagen and elastin production to reduce wrinkles, scars (especially acne scars), and stretch marks, and improving skin texture, tone, and hyperpigmentation. It also enhances the effectiveness of skincare products by increasing their absorption and can promote hair growth on the scalp.

products.name: Nizoral Anti-dandruff Shampoo
products.description: Nizoral anti-dandruff shampoo features a key ingredient, ketoconazole, to fight dandruff at its root cause by controlling the fungus that causes flaking, scaling, and itching. It is clinically proven to relieve dandruff symptoms and can be used twice a week to control the condition. The shampoo is gentle enough for color-treated and chemically processed hair, rinses clean, and has a fresh scent.

details.name: Features
items: Contains ketoconazole, a powerful antifungal ingredient that targets the root cause of dandruff
maintain a healthy scalp and prevent dandruff from returning.
Safe for use on color-treated and chemically processed hair.
Creates a thick, rich lather that rinses clean and leaves hair with a fresh scent.
Only needs to be used twice a week for effective dandruff control.

products.name: Derma Roller
products.description: A derma roller is a skincare device featuring a handle and a roller head covered in tiny microneedles, typically made of titanium or stainless steel. Key features include the needle length, which varies for different purposes, an ergonomic handle for a comfortable grip, and a durable, often rust-resistant construction. Some models are pre-sterilized for immediate use.

details.name: Features
items: Made from titanium
can be used on various parts of the face, neck, and body, and some are suitable for the scalp or beard area
Reduces wrinkles and fine lines.
Improves skin texture and tone.
micro-channels created by the needles allow skincare products to penetrate the skin more effectively.

products.name: Cold-Pressed Pumpkin Seed Oil

images.name: Front view
images.alt: Front view of Pumpkin Seed oil

products.description: Pumpkin seed oil features include its rich nutrient profile of omega-3 and -6 fatty acids, zinc, and antioxidants like vitamin E, which nourish hair follicles, strengthen strands, and provide moisture. It is also known for potentially stimulating hair growth by blocking the hormone DHT and can be used topically to improve scalp health, shine, and manageability.

details.name: Features
items: Promotes hair growth
contains essential fatty acids (omega-3 and -6), zinc, magnesium, and antioxidants like vitamin E, which support hair follicle health
helps fortify hair strands and prevents breakage
Its fatty acids help the hair and scalp retain moisture
helps reduce inflammation and improve scalp circulation
adds a natural shine to hair
antioxidants in the oil can protect hair from environmental stressors like UV rays
